items.description: Method call was successful but targeted property is deprecated
items.name: PropertyDeprecated

items.description: Method call was successful but method is deprecated

items.description: Method call is invalid in current operating context

items.description: There is a conflict with the current state of the device
items.name: Conflict

items.description: Method parameter does not meet expectations
items.name: ParameterError

items.description: Addressed method is not implemented by the addressed object

items.description: The device is not ready to handle any commands
items.name: NotReady
